title: Sin
description: He was dangerous, but the real sin was mine.Sinclair was my secret obsession.The one I dreamed of in a homelife filled with violence and pain.It was Sin’s darkness that saved me, wrapping its way around my heart until it beat only for him.I helped him escape his island prison.He asked me to leave with him.But my mother is pregnant, and I won’t let another child be raised in that house of horrors.The only way to free her is to betray the man I want and the family he’s creating.Love is impossible when my only option is to sin.--Sin (Dark Island Scots, #2) continues the story started in Ruin (Dark Island Scots, #1). This is Sinclair and Lottie’s romance, so expect exquisite and seductive scenes, a plus-sized heroine and her much bigger hero, and an insidious mystery threatening our tribe of found family.
author: Jolie Vines
